minor.author: rlanda@microsoft.com
minor.comment: Minor adjustment to dependencies, making @minecraft/server a peer instead of direct dependency

patch.author: rlanda@microsoft.com
patch.comment: Trim down package contents for publish. Ensure right exports. Fixing version specifications.

minor.author: rlanda@microsoft.com
minor.comment: Add Vector2 helpers for parity with some helpers used in editor before

major.author: rlanda@microsoft.com
major.comment: Initial implementation of a @minecraft/math library with support for two paradigms. Added test and lint support, and also migrated lint rule for command suggestions to this repo. Started the creation of shared build tools.

major.author: rlanda@microsoft.com
major.comment: Switch to a couple of classes with static methods to remove ambiguity with shortly named methods
